en: seek help through patience and prayer.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

ar: وَلَا تَقُولُوا لِمَن يُقْتَلُ فِى سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
en: And do not say about those who are killed in the way of Allah,
And We will surely test you with something of
and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits,
but give good tidings to the patient,
"Indeed we belong to Allah, and indeed to Him we will return."

ar: أُولَئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوَتٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ
en: Those are the ones upon whom are blessings from their Lord and mercy.
And it is those who are the [rightly] guided.
